channel.title: Wants to do something?
channel.description:
Okaay, I just restarted Rs yeah.. Everytime I log on I'm like FML I'm bored after 2 minutes.
So who wants to do something that isn't a pile of shnizzle drizzle :o? Preferably a group of people though O_o. I was thinking maybe like go bandos quite a few of us, rake in the gepeee's:)? Pooost <3

item.title: Wants to do something?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

if no third party software or ‘cheat’ is used to lure then in my eyes it’s in the game on purpose and can be done throughout the game, it’s the victims fault for being stupid.

Read full topic

item.title: Wants to do something?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:37, topic:410077”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=511345.msg3716646#msg3716646 date=1313685397]

[quote author=gravenfire234 link=topic=511345.msg3716392#msg3716392 date=1313671122]

Isn’t luring counted as scamming. Inb4weallbecomePure2Ownage

No it’s it not. And what’s Pure2Ownage?
[/quote]Pure2Ownage was a member of these forums banned for scamming on runescape.

Ohhh. Well if I get banned from Mopar for luring on RS, then the staff needs to be changed up a bit.
[/quote]You’re saying MITB would need to be banned from his own forums? :rolleyes:[/quote]

If I get banned for luring, yes.

Read full topic

Its not scamming its similar though. Theres no way to regulate luring so jagex put wildi ditch etc in (which still fail) so jagex allow it but frown upon it.

#NowIKnow

item.title: Wants to do something?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:27, topic:410077”][quote author=gravenfire234 link=topic=511345.msg3715865#msg3715865 date=1313627574]

I’m going to start luring too :3
My brother just got 94 mage, can do ancients, and I can almost afford another Santa hat. (10m/130m!)
[/quote]If you want i can help im 95 mage atm and will be getting 99 soon plus a chaotic staff and all that other good stuff.

No thanks. I don’t trust anybody anymore. If my brother decides to turn on me, I’ll hack his acc and have a drop party
Same ip meaning that shit is basically mine.[/quote]

You can help me and ExtremeX-Scape lure once I get strength. And having trust issues isn’t a good thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Wants to do something?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“ExtremeX-Scape™, post:23, topic:410077”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=511345.msg3714805#msg3714805 date=1313558991]

I wanna lure in about a week or so after I get 99 strength. I’m combat 106 (104 in wildy), and I think I’ll be 107 or 108 by the time I get 99 strength so pm me if you’re going to lure. xD

I could do that too, I’m 106 in wildy, 111 out of wildy, it could work

I have all 3 magic books (99 mage ftw)

Do you have ancients? Because I’m waiting for my friend to get back from vacation so we can do DT together. (Butt buddies), so if you need it I can TB and… entagle :o

How much do all 3 cost? Or do you buy them? I’m so confused.
[/quote]

No you don’t buy them, you get lunar and ancients by 2 quest’s, desert treasure, and uhh forgot.[/quote]

Ohhhh I know what you mean now. Desert Treasure and Lunar diplomacy. I thought you were talking about Mage Book’s or something like that. Yew dun confused meh fir a minuet there.

Read full topic
